Aegadian Islands.title: Aegadian Islands
Aegadian Islands.byline: The Aegadian Islands or Egadi Islands (Italian: Isole Egadi) are a group of three islands about 10 km west of Trapani and Marsala on the north-western coast of Sicily in Italy.

Aegina.title: Aegina
Aegina.byline: Aegina (Greek: Αίγινα) is one of the Saronic Gulf Islands, a triangle 11 km on each side.
